definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
lit. chicken feathers and garlic skins (idiom)/fig. trivial (matter)
to act stupid/to play dumb/to pretend to not know
lit. to kowtow like grinding garlic (idiom)/fig. to pound the ground with one's head

sentences.english: Get the carrot, onion and garlic from the broth out and throw them out.
sentences.chinese: 把胡萝卜，葱和蒜从肉汤里取出来扔掉。

sentences.english: First, I sauteed the onions and garlic, then added the chopped tomato.
sentences.chinese: 我先炒过洋葱和蒜，然后加了切碎的番茄。

sentences.english: Shaanxi food is also known for its liberal use of vinegar and garlic.
sentences.chinese: 陕西食品还因其可以自由使用醋和蒜而出名。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a method for evaluation of physiochemical characteristics and the stability of Alliin substance.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立蒜氨酸原料药理化性质和稳定性的评价方法。

sentences.english: Vegetables are frequently doused with vinegar and garlic.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜经常会加在醋和蒜上。

sentences.english: Garlic is down, the water boiled, taste strong.
sentences.chinese: 蒜是新下来的，水一煮，味太冲。

sentences.english: Avoid the croutons and creamy dressings, which have the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 尽量避免蒜香和奶油调料，因为会产生相反的效果。

sentences.english: Then throw in the garlic and scallions and sprinkle the thyme over the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 然后放入蒜和葱，并在鸡块上撒上百里香。

sentences.english: As a result, the yield and quality of alliin attained the requirement of predesign .
sentences.chinese: 最终蒜氨酸得率和质量达到了设计要求。

sentences.english: Add chopped garlic and seasoning. Cook for a while. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 加入蒜茸和调味料，煮片刻，盛起，即可品尝。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare the alliin standard for the content and specific rotation determining.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备蒜氨酸对照品，供含量测定和比旋度测定用。

sentences.english: Eat leeks in march, and garlic in May and all the year after physicians may play.
sentences.chinese: 三月吃韭，五月吃蒜，医生可成年悠闲自在。

sentences.english: Called Allium sativum, garlic is one of the most studied herbs in relation to heart benefits.
sentences.chinese: 年夜蒜是被研究得最多的有利于心脏的草本植物之一。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a preparation method for working reference substance of alliin.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立蒜氨酸工作对照品。

sentences.english: Finely slice the lemongrass, galangal, garlic, shallot, ginger and chili.
sentences.chinese: 把香茅，良姜，蒜，干葱，姜和辣椒切成细丝或碎。

sentences.english: But allicin of fresh garlic is the existence of garlic aminoacid that is stabilization and smell less.
sentences.chinese: 但鲜蒜中大蒜素是以稳定无臭的大蒜氨酸的形式存在。

definition: same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
